name: Laser Puch
description:
This is my first game development experience. I developed this game with Constract3

I was inspired by games like:  Windjammers and pong...

Music and sounds are missing, I'm looking for someone who can help me make them.

At the moment  the game as one level . In this level you will have to compete against an alien, when the layout is start each player has five points, the first player who reaches zero points lost the set. 

If you win three sets you will have won the game! 

Press and hold "X"  to grab the disc-----  release "X"  to throw the disc! use the arrow keys for give it  the  direction.
